mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT A.KANBAN_ID AS kanbanId, A.KANBAN_PLAN_NO AS kanbanPlanNo, A.ORDER_MONTH AS orderMonth FROM TNT_KANBAN A INNER JOIN (SELECT MAX(KANBAN_ID) AS KANBAN_ID FROM TNT_KANBAN WHERE OFFICE_ID = #{officeId} GROUP BY KANBAN_PLAN_NO ) K ON A.KANBAN_ID = K.KANBAN_ID INNER JOIN TNT_KANBAN_SHIPPING B ON A.KANBAN_ID = B.KANBAN_ID WHERE A.OFFICE_ID = #{officeId} AND A.STATUS != 99 AND B.NIRD_FLAG = 0 AND B.COMPLETED_FLAG = 0 AND B.ETD < #{officeToday}

SELECT DISTINCT A.KANBAN_ID AS kanbanId, A.KANBAN_PLAN_NO AS kanbanPlanNo, A.ORDER_MONTH AS orderMonth, B.KANBAN_SHIPPING_ID AS kanbanShippingId, B.SHIPPING_UUID AS shippingUUID, B.ORIGINAL_VERSION AS originalVersion, B.REVISION_VERSION AS revisionVersion, B.TRANSPORT_MODE AS transportMode, B.COMPLETED_FLAG AS completedFlag, B.NIRD_FLAG AS nirdFlag, B.ETD AS etd, B.ETA AS eta, B.IMP_INB_PLAN_DATE AS inbPlanDate, D.KANBAN_PLAN_ID AS differBoxId, E.KANBAN_PLAN_ID AS dummyBoxId, C.PARTS_ID AS partsId, C.QTY AS planQty FROM TNT_KANBAN A INNER JOIN TNT_KANBAN_SHIPPING B ON A.KANBAN_ID = B.KANBAN_ID INNER JOIN TNT_KANBAN_SHIPPING_PARTS C ON B.KANBAN_SHIPPING_ID = C.KANBAN_SHIPPING_ID LEFT JOIN TNT_KANBAN_PLAN D ON B.KANBAN_ID = D.KANBAN_ID AND B.SHIPPING_UUID = D.SHIPPING_UUID AND D.PLAN_TYPE = 1 LEFT JOIN TNT_KANBAN_PLAN E ON B.KANBAN_ID = E.KANBAN_ID AND B.SHIPPING_UUID = E.SHIPPING_UUID AND E.PLAN_TYPE = 3 WHERE A.KANBAN_ID = #{kanbanId} AND B.NIRD_FLAG = 0 AND B.COMPLETED_FLAG = 0 ORDER BY B.TRANSPORT_MODE ASC, B.ETD ASC, B.ETA ASC, B.IMP_INB_PLAN_DATE ASC

SELECT DISTINCT A.KANBAN_ID AS kanbanId, A.KANBAN_PLAN_NO AS kanbanPlanNo, B.PARTS_ID AS partsId, B.SPQ AS spq, B.STATUS AS partStatus, C.SHIPPING_ROUTE_CODE AS shippingRouteCode, C.EXP_PARTS_ID AS expPartsId FROM TNT_KANBAN A INNER JOIN TNT_KANBAN_PARTS B ON A.KANBAN_ID = B.KANBAN_ID INNER JOIN TNM_EXP_PARTS C ON A.SUPPLIER_ID = C.SUPPLIER_ID AND B.PARTS_ID = C.PARTS_ID WHERE A.KANBAN_ID = #{kanbanId}
SELECT MAX(A.ORIGINAL_VERSION) AS originalVersion FROM TNT_KANBAN_SHIPPING A WHERE A.KANBAN_ID = #{kanbanId}
